import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Details = (props) => { const amount = props.amount; const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm(); const [saveInfo, setSaveInfo] = useState(false); const [showGpayAlert, setShowGpayAlert] = useState(false); const [showCashAppAlert, setShowCashAppAlert] = useState(false); const [showAfterpayAlert, setShowAfterpayAlert] = useState(false); const onSubmit = (data) => { // Handle form submission console.log(data); }; const handleSaveInfo = () => { setSaveInfo(!saveInfo); }; const handleGpayClick = () => { setShowGpayAlert(!showGpayAlert); }; const handleCashAppClick = () => { setShowCashAppAlert(!showCashAppAlert); }; const handleAfterpayClick = () => { setShowAfterpayAlert(!showAfterpayAlert); }; return (

${amount}

Order total

${amount}

REQUIRED*

{errors.email &&

Email is required

} {errors.phone &&

Phone number is required

}

EXPRESS CHECKOUT

{showGpayAlert && (

Not Available at this moment

)}

CONTACT

PAYMENT

All transactions are secure and encrypted

{errors.cardNumber && (

Card number is required

)} {errors.expiration && (

Invalid expiration date

)} {errors.cvc && (

Invalid CVC

)} {errors.postalCode && (

)}

Cash App Pay

{showCashAppAlert && (

)}

4 interest-free installments of $7.50

{showAfterpayAlert && (

)}

REMEMBER ME

Save my information for a faster checkout
Pay

Secure payment by Square

); }; export default Details;
